references.reason: This paper introduces a decoupled weight decay regularization technique that is crucial for optimizing the performance of the segmentation network used in this study.

references.paper_title: Inductive representation learning on large graphs
references.reason: This paper introduces the GraphSAGE model, a fundamental component of the graph neural network utilized to learn the unified label space in the proposed method.

references.paper_title: MSeg: A composite dataset for multi-domain semantic segmentation
references.reason: This paper presents MSeg, a widely used dataset for semantic segmentation that directly inspired the multi-dataset training aspect of this study.

references.paper_title: Semi-supervised classification with graph convolutional networks
references.reason: This paper introduced graph convolutional networks (GCNs), which are related to the graph neural networks used in this work for learning label relationships.

references.paper_title: High-resolution representations for labeling pixels and regions
references.reason: This paper introduces the HRNet architecture, which is the backbone of the segmentation network used in this study, critical for the model's performance.
